spec_data.Name: fedwatch
spec_data.Description:
Tool and library for watching fedmsg messages and running arbitrary scripts in a
nice way.

Think of fedwatch as simple converter from fedmsg json messages into shell
arguments for scripts.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:16:41 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tool for watching fedmsg messages and running arbitrary scripts
